.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.1.0 (2013-09-23)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.

0.1.1 (2013-09-25)
++++++++++++++++++

* Fixed broken PyPI package.

0.2.0 (2013-09-28)
++++++++++++++++++

* Parents now an array instead of a single value.

0.2.1 (2013-10-07)
++++++++++++++++++

* Re-implemented parser with regular expressions.
* Character encoding issues fixed.
